task.title: Add Trusted IP Addresses into Whitelist
task.shortdesc: To avoid that your trusted IP address would be blocked, you need to add your trusted IP address, especially the IP/domain of your office, into the Whitelist.

step.cmd: Go to Settings System Security IP Whitelist , click Add.
On the configuration page, enter the name and your trusted IP/domain.

choices.choice: Name: Set a name for the IP whitelist.
Description: Enter description of the trusted IP/domain.
Source IP Address: If you choose IP type, enter the trusted IP address.
Domain Name: If you choose Domain Name, enter the domain of the trusted domain.
